friday.description: Don't have a team yet? No problem! Head to community area outside Henry Koffler at 9 PM for a meet and greet of other participants who don't have a team
No description has been provided for this event

Come get some fresh air outside the hackathon and test you balance on our slackline! Slacklining is a alternative sport where hackers can walk and balance on a long piece of nylon rope strung between trees. Our slackline will be taught and only one foot off the ground so new and experienced hackers can enjoy slacking off!

saturday.description: Yoga is a great way to clear your head and recharge your body in the midst. A recently graduated UA graduate student has offered to volunteer her skills in some relaxing and energizing yoga on the mall.

At the UA Hackathon, we support our hackers, volunteers, organizers, and mentors who are in recovery. There will be a 12 step meeting on Saturday at 10:00am in the iSpace (2nd floor of the Science and Engineering Library) open to anyone working a 12 step recovery program. If you would like information about meetings in Tucson for additional meetings or support for AA, Alanon, SLAA, or NA, you can find links to them below. If your program isn 't listed here and you need help finding resources, feel free to email stephensrec@gmail.com and we can help you find the right meeting. http://aatucson.org/ http://www.al-anon-southernaz.org/ http://www.tucsonslaa.org/ http://www.natucson.org/meetinglist.php
The Pet Partners of Southern Arizona will be bringing therapy dogs to our hackathon again this year! Come hang out with all the puppers and doggos your heart can handle.
Write a program to detect if a sentence contains a palindrome. Prize: Gemma wearable computer. See challenge under events.
Decrypt the hash 4e2ab1da03b6ebfaeff88d8bcdaea371. Prize: T-Shirt. See challenge under activities in the app
Think you can build a website in 15 minutes with only one shot to run your code? Come take on this challenge brought to you by MLH. After the event there will be t-shirts given out!
Write a program to create an 8X8 crossword puzzle with and ONLY with the following words: RMS, BYTE, HACKAZ, EXCITE, SOFTWARE, HERTZ. Prize: Solar phone charger
What is the length and type of Raytheon's longest missile? Prize: Gemma wearable computer
Probably our most anticipated activity of the hackathon, the Super Smash Brothers Melee Competition is a 4 hour tournament!

saturday.activity: Minute to Win It Relay Games
saturday.description: The Elephant March is a wacky and fun relay race where students compete to swing and knock over bottles using only the tennis ball inside the nylons pulled over their head, it’s ridiculous to watch and hilarious to play! In the Donut Eating Race will compete to see who can finish a donut on a string the fastest above their head without their hands in our Donut Eating Contest.
Create a program which makes a 10x10 initial Minesweeper game board.
Arizona is most well-known for its mining of what mineral? First person to stop by the Hexagon Mining table with the correct answer will win a prize!

Create a rock paper scissors AI in python. Come to Raytheon booth for details. Info session at 4PM and tournament at 7PM. Prize: Top 4 get to choose between August Smart lock, $50 gift card, or a  solar phone charger.

The Charles Darwin Experience is the University’s only all improv comedy group and this year they are making their Hack Arizona debut! Come be an active audience member in shouting out zany suggestions for the improvised games the Darwins will be playing in a fun “Whose Line Is It Anyway?” style performance.
What mineral is used computers, laptops, calculators, and computer circuits? Hurry over to the Hexagon Mining table for some fun swag

Write a program that takes 4 inputs: x # of people, y # of turns before they die, medicine adds on z # of turns, and w turns are needed to be considered cured. Restrictions are as follows:    y > x , z > x, and (w-y)/z > 2 . The program should output if given invalid inputs and  an array for each turn that shows the number of turns that each person has until everyone is cured. Prize: Solar phone charger
What mineral is used computers, laptops, calculators, and computer circuits? Hurry over to the Hexagon Mining table for some fun swag
The helmet of an astronaut’s space suit is coated with a very thin film of what mineral? Come to the Hexagon Mining table with the correct answer to win a prize!
Create a program which makes a 10x10 initial Minesweeper game board. Prize: Top 3 get a wearable Gemma computer
Name 10 programming languages used by Raytheon. Prize: 4 winners, first two get a wifi-enabled Arduino, next two get a T-shirt
What mineral has the highest thermal conductivity? Give the correct answer at the Hexagon Mining Table to show off your skills!
What does the word 'Raytheon' mean? Prize: Arduino or Gemma wearable
How good are you in Rock PAPER Sissors? Raytheon wants you to prove it in their winner takes all tourney!
Classic min-max tree challenge. See #ask-raytheon on Discord for the pdf.

Come participate in or simple be a spectator to our biggest activity of the hackathon, our comedy hypnotist! This unique and engaging show will convince the non-believers how influential the power of persuasion can have on the mind.

sunday.description: Come get lit with the Hack AZ squad at our dance party on the Main Floor
